name: Dominance of Earth
title: Zhongli: Dominance of Earth
desc: The vastness of rivers flows endless, perpetual upon the tapestry of eons.
in_play_description: When your active character is protected by a Shield Character Status or a Shield Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 Geo DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Zhongli to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Zhongli, equip this card.
After Zhongli equips this card, immediately use Dominus Lapidis: Striking Stone once.
When your active character is protected by a Shield Character Status or a Shield Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 Geo DMG.
(You must have Zhongli in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
